name: Just Another Zombie Game (Adib)
description:
A 2D top-down shooter game, exclusively created for My First Game Jam . In this game, you need to kill all the zombies to win. It's literally a very basic top down shooter game.

This is my first created game. I've teamed up with  Ryleon who has done all the sound design.

Assets : Player, Enemy : tokkatrain World : Kenney Fonts : Free to use
